summary: The PHP SDK lacks support for decoding binary/protobuf encoded messages. A Binary Protobuf Converter needs to be added to the default converter set to enable decoding of these messages while maintaining JSON/protobuf as the default marshalling format.
userImpact: Users cannot decode messages that were converted using binary/protobuf format, limiting interoperability with systems using that encoding.
rootCause: Binary Protobuf Converter is missing from the default converter set in the PHP SDK
proposedFix: Add the Binary Protobuf Converter to the default set after ProtoJsonConverter
resolutionDetails: Binary Protobuf Converter was added to the default converter set
keyQuote: We have no ability to decode messages converted with binary/protobuf.
